entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
